title: Ahsan expresses grief over Agha Siraj Durrani’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP):Federal Minister for Planning, Development and Special Initiatives Professor Ahsan Iqbal on Wednesday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the demise of former Speaker of the Sindh Assembly, Agha Siraj Durrani.
In his condolence message, the minister extended heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved family and prayed for the elevation of the departed soul’s ranks. Ahsan Iqbal paid tribute to Agha Siraj Durrani’s lifelong political and parliamentary services, saying that his contributions to strengthening democracy in the country would always be remembered.
He said Durrani played a significant role in promoting democratic values and parliamentary traditions, adding that his death was a great loss to the political fraternity.
